description: Comprehensive facility data for medical resource planning in Ghana

fields.name: facility_name
fields.description: Official name of the medical facility

fields.name: procedures_free_text
fields.description: Unstructured description of medical procedures performed. May include volumes, complexity levels, and informal notes.
fields.example: Advanced cardiac surgery including bypass and valve replacement. Neurosurgery with full ICU support.
fields.notes: This is a KEY field for IDP - contains critical capability information in natural language

fields.name: equipment_free_text
fields.description: Unstructured description of medical equipment available. May include equipment status, counts, and limitations.
fields.example: 3 Tesla MRI scanner, 128-slice CT scanner, Cardiac catheterization lab
fields.notes: This is a KEY field for IDP - equipment availability determines procedure capability

fields.name: specialties_free_text
fields.description: Unstructured description of medical specialties and departments. May include staff counts and service details.
fields.example: Cardiothoracic surgery, Neurosurgery, Nephrology with dialysis (40 machines)
fields.notes: This is a KEY field for IDP - indicates staffing and departmental capabilities

fields.name: staff_count
fields.description: Total number of medical and support staff

data_quality_notes.description: Some facilities claim capabilities that don't match their equipment or staffing levels
examples: FAC004 claims cardiac surgery but lacks proper equipment
FAC014 claims surgical capacity but has no surgeon on staff

data_quality_notes.description: Equipment may be listed but non-functional
Free-text fields may be sparse for smaller facilities
data_quality_notes.note: Smaller facilities tend to have less detailed documentation
